definition: healthy and beautiful/to do fitness exercises/abbr. for 健美運動|健美运动[jian4 mei3 yun4 dong4]
healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Modern exterior doors often fit and insulate better than old ones.
sentences.chinese: 現代健美的外門往往比舊的絕緣。

sentences.english: Bronco was a bodybuilding champion who was imprisoned for murdering his wife.
sentences.chinese: 布蘭槿是一個健美冠軍，他因謀殺妻子而入獄。

sentences.english: Are there all female students in aerobic club?
sentences.chinese: 健美社團裏都是女同學嗎？

sentences.english: Emotions have direct influences on the quality of calisthenics teaching.
sentences.chinese: 情緒直接影響健美操教學的質量。

sentences.english: A slim armrest and dead foot rest are also provided for extra comfort.
sentences.chinese: 健美的扶手和死亡的腳休息，也提供了額外的舒適。

sentences.english: He was very big, but he was also stone solid—muscle, not fat.
sentences.chinese: 他身材非常高大，可是並不肥，都是健美的肌肉。

sentences.english: For men, you can try some body-building.
sentences.chinese: 對於男人，你可以試試健美。

sentences.english: I hope I am lucky enough to be a qualified body-builder coach in this club.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能夠幸運地成爲一名合格的健美教練。

sentences.english: He even pulled up his shirt to show me his toned and tanned abs on his new washboard stomach.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至撩起襯衫給我看他那健美膚色強健的腹肌。
邁克爾記得威爾選了健美。

sentences.english: My approach to this difference is to show bodybuilders using potatoes for their training.
sentences.chinese: 我的方法來證明這種差異是健美運動員訓練用的土豆。

sentences.english: Female bodybuilding is the female component of competitive bodybuilding.
sentences.chinese: 女子健美是競技性健美運動的一部分。

sentences.english: Female bodybuilding is the female component of competitive bodybuilding.
sentences.chinese: 女子健美是競技性健美運動的一部分。

sentences.english: Just because he's a body builder doesn't mean he can't be a ballet dancer.
sentences.chinese: 只因他練健美，並不代表他不能當芭蕾舞者。

sentences.english: The synthetic banting meted can access health.
sentences.chinese: 綜合減肥方法減肥後能達到健美和健康要求。

definition: (of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
